content: > a free version of this pattern is > available here > http //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2015/10/lest-we-forget-poppy-afghan-square-free-pattern html the lest we forget poppy afghan square is a 6 inch square created as part of the sampler lapghan crochet a long 1 change the colors for a lovely spring or summer flower afghan block or blanket theme or honor our veterans with the poppy square design and original colors this square is supported with a full photo tutorial a video tutorial is now available thanks to nadia fuad thank you nadia https //youtu be/buskv9rhq8y use this pretty design to create a lapghan blanket or pillow cover the design has been fully tested please favorite and queue the design if you make it i would love to see your finished photos and if you want to be featured in one of my weekly newsletters message me and let me know i will add an approved photo and link to you or your site/shop rhondda 1 http //www thecountrywillows com/the-willow-whispers-a-crochet-blog/crochet-memories-country-willow-crochet-a-long
